info.title: API-Rest documentation for YAAFLEX
info.description: This is a Sample documentation of YAAFLEX. Use this section to create your own description of documentation based on OPEN-API JSON and SWAGGER

post.description: Using this path to generate a JSON Web token to make external API Request as admin

parameters.name: JSON object
parameters.description: We use this object to login.

post.description: Using this path to generate a JSON Web token to make external API Request as user

parameters.name: JSON object
parameters.description: We use this object to login.

get.description: Using this path to get all the data in catalogue

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: It is used to request  the API from external APP you can use a simple token, Bearer token or Basic Auth. You must only use basic auth from a perfil of user and only request Server to Server to protect the information.

parameters.name: JSON query
parameters.description:
We use this this parameters to rich our requests.
 
 Example: { strictsearch:{ name:'Afghanistan' }, sort:{ name:'desc'}, 'search':{'name':'< something to search like true, false, or %word%  >'},paginate:{limit:10, page:1} select:{ name:1, id:1 } ; 
 Meaning: 

 sort: order by field in desc or asc 
 paginate: limits results by page an limit(how namy) per page 
 strictsearch: make a strict search (match case) 
 avoid: avoids contents that includes that (match case) 
 like: makes a subquery frm  principal query %find% 
 select: returns onliy the fiels you wanna 
 search: search as bolean or as %word% in SQL 
 SOON more search parameters
